parameters.name: ProgramId
parameters.description: The ID of the episode list that you want to query. It is included in the response when you call the [AddPlaylistItems](~~203414#doc-api-live-AddPlaylistItems~~ "Adds episodes to a production studio of the video carousel mode.") operation.

parameters.name: ProgramItemIds
parameters.description:
The IDs of the episodes that you want to query. Separate episode IDs with commas (,).

If you set this parameter, only the information about the specified episodes is returned. If you do not set this parameter, the information about all episodes in the specified episode list is returned.
